importantArticles.headline: Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) stock saw a day of big sell-offs Thursday.  The semiconductor company's share price wound up down 8.4% in a day of trading that saw the S&P 500 fall 3.5% and the Nasdaq Composite fall 4.4%.  The stock market followed Wednesday's surge on tariff news with substantial sell-offs today as more information about import taxes on China came into focus.

importantArticles.headline: SANTA CLARA, Calif., April 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AMD (NASDAQ: AMD) announced today that it will report fiscal first quarter 2025 financial results on Tuesday, May 6, 2025, after the close of market. importantArticles.headline: To say that the stock market has been volatile lately doesn't do the situation justice.  The S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC) and several other major market indexes recently fell by more than 10% over a two-day period in response to President Trump's surprisingly high tariff rates.  The S&P 500 is now 18% below its February high, and with a 23% drop, the Nasdaq Composite (NASDAQINDEX: ^IXIC) is now firmly in bear market territory.
importantArticles.title: Stock Market Crash: Here Are 5 Stocks Down 27% or More I'd Buy Right Now
